alert.note: Alert for Annette Island; City and Borough of Sitka; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 22 at 4:01AM AKST until December 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Baranof Island including Sitka and Port Alexander, Western Kupreanof Island and Kuiu Island, Prince of Wales Island, Ketchikan Gateway Borough and Annette Island. * WHEN...From late Saturday morning through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...High winds could blow around unsecured objects, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest winds will likely be late Saturday afternoon into Saturday evening.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure vessels and loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Annette Island; City and Borough of Sitka; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
